TopicTitle: I did a thing in League of Legends

Articles.Content:
So, in League there's a thing where you can score multi-kills in matches, up to the elusive and revered "Pentakill", where you somehow manage to land the killing blow onto all five members of the opposing team. I've only ever had one of these, until today that is:

The only reason I got that I think is because I hung back from the initial fight, long enough at least where everyone had already used their abilities besides myself. Arcane floods ensued, and in the end I stood over six corpses, a fallen ally and the entire other team. The match finished up pretty quickly after that, but I feel good.

Edited January 17, 2016 by [ Jeremy ]
